category.name: Integration.Configuring CAE
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: CAE_Root_BOMLineAction_Preference
preference.preference_description: Specifies the default actions for a criteria executed on the root BOM Line in the CAE Manager's Inspector view. The valid values are "Do Nothing", "Use Revised Model" and "Use New Model".The default value for the action is "Do Nothing".
